item.title: Veeam vCenter Migration Utility
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: Way back in 2013, I published Preserve your Veeam B&R Backups Jobs when Moving vCenter, outlining how to «cheat» (by using a CNAME alias) to preserve your Veeam Backup & Replication jobs if you replace your VMware vCenter. Naturally, when there is a new vCenter instance, all the Virtual Machine Managed Object Reference’s (MoRef) change, which makes Veeam Backup & Replication start a new backup/replication chain, since all VMs are treated as new ones.
